article: skokie police are continuing to investigate the friday night shooting in a bank of america parking lot that left one person injured , a police spokesman confirmed police responded to a report of shots fired around 11:05 in the 3300 block of west touhy avenue , a male was found with a gunshot wound . he has not been identified by police officer eric swaback said monday that no arrests have been made in connection with the incident , and the motive for the shooting continues to be said authorities do not believe there is any threat to the general shooting victim was taken to a local hospital in stable condition , which is the last available update , swaback said are still looking for information from the public regarding the incident , authorities with any information can is asked to call 982-5900 or the 24-hour skokie crime tip hotline at 933-tips .
abstract: no arrest or motive in bank parking lot shooting incident : skokie police
